description:
The Vardag Shorts look good, and wear even better. Made from Fjallraven’s rugged G-1000 Eco material and treated with their signature wax, these shorts are tougher than they look.

  • Hardwearing G-1000 Eco Stretch material is impregnated with fluorocarbon-free wax for better protection from the elements
  • 2 front pockets and 2 back drop-in pockets keep necessities close
  • Pleated front with high waistline for a flattering look
  • Leg ends can be rolled up for adjustability and held in place with side buttoned straps
  • Gusseted crotch keeps up with your active life
name: Fjallraven Vardag Shorts - Women's
